pr_title: Make Spring configuration resistant to renames

timeline.message:
Make Spring configuration resistant to renames

This commit makes sure we don't hardcode any package/class names in our
Spring configuration.

JIRA: LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-2208

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we should not delete this file?
timeline.author: IvanBorislavovDimitrov
